name: (Re)setting 100% Mineral Powder SPF 35 Mineral Sunscreen
about: What it is: A mineral setting powder that mattifies shine, sets makeup & applies sunscreen with an easy-to-use, soft-bristled brush...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Pores and Oiliness..Highlighted Ingredients:- 100% Mineral Zinc Oxide: Delivers broad-spectrum UV protection..- Ceramides and Olive Glycerides: Help seal in moisture..- Coated Silica: Diffuses light and helps to diminish the visible appearance of pores...Ingredient Callouts: This product is gluten-free, cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: With a built-in brush, mineral sunscreen actives & mattifying ingredients to control shine, this on-the-go essential makes it easy to retouch your look & reapply SPF anytime, anywhere — even over makeup. Use it at home to set your look, then toss it in your bag to use throughout the day...
ingredients: -Mineral Zinc Oxide: Delivers broad-spectrum UV protection..-Ceramides and Olive Glycerides: Seal in moisture. .-Coated Silica: Diffuses light and diminishes the appearance of pores for a soft-focus finish...Zinc Oxide 24.5%, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Silica, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Triethoxycaprylysilane, Nylon-6/12, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Olive Glycerides, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Ceramide 3, Iron Oxides (CI 77492, 77491, 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.To apply:.-Prep skin with your favorite SPF-spiked moisturizer or primer, as the last step in your skincare routine..-After applying your makeup, brush the powder generously over your face to set the look..-Continue to use throughout the day to mattify shine and reapply your SPF....To open:.-Remove the cap, slide down the clear plastic sleeve, and remove the yellow pin from the center of the brush..-Twist the body of the brush from the closed position to open..-Tilt and tap the brush gently against your wrist until the powder flows through the bristles..-Use powder generously to reapply your UV protection....To close:.-Twist the body of the brush from the open position to closed, being careful not to twist beyond the closed position..-Pull up the clear plastic sleeve and snap the cap back on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was in Las Vegas during the summer and had forgotten my SPF and only had this product. I used it on my face and chest and I didn’t burn at all!! And I am super pale and burn easily. This product works !!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Could not get the product to come out. Had to return.

reviews.review_title: Great concept but didn't work with my skin.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this product during the summer. I was looking for a powder that offered SPF protection that I could apply throughout the day. I found the applicator easy to use (just needed to follow the instructions) but at times, it was a challenging to see if product was indeed coming out.  My skin didn't tolerate the product well and I seemed to have more acne after I started using it. As a result, I ended up returning it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It does the job for second application when I am at the beach especially when I have makeup on. You need to remove the yellow cylinder tube in the brush to make sure the product comes out. But I still have trouble getting enough powder out to actually cover my full face with adequate sunscreen. It's better than nothing but needs improvement.   The first time I bought this, the brush just broke off and nothing came out. But the second time I bought it, some powder comes out. Decent but not amazing

reviews.review_title: Handy and good at taming oiliness
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My second time purchasing this. I’m sure i’m not getting much spf protection from this, but it helps me set my physical sunscreen whenever I’m out and i need to reapply. It’s handy and easy to carry around, and some protection is better than none!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this brand but not this product. Applicator broke after 4 or 5 uses and spilled powder all over. Super expensive for a very small amount of powder. I wanted to love this but I will definitely not re purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product!! I burn an easily on my scalp and this saves the day when you don’t want to wear a hat. I used it daily on my trip to Mexico and didn’t burn once. It’s also a nice freshen up on the face too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very practical once you use it well. You have to remove the little yellow plastic in the middle in order to allow the powder to come out, but there are no instructions about it on the package.

reviews.review_title: Great option for reapplying sunscreen over makeup
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A powder with sunscreen... perfect idea to keep oily skin under control and protected against sun damage. I don't think this should be used as your only sun protection, I use the Glowscreen as my main sunscreen and use this product just to reset it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Not useful. The product doesn't come out easily, it feels like is just not staying in the face at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m very pale and it works for me…a great setting powder on it’s own as I even use it for night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super easy to apply on the go, i LOVE that it’s matte because most sunscreen gives a greasy look so adding this after my regular sunscreen is a game changer!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is really good I brought it on my trip to Mexico, and used it on my scalp since I always burn there. I was worried that the 35 spf was not going to be enough for me because I have pretty fair skin but I re-applied it multiple times in a day and it worked very well, my scalp didn't burn once. I think that a lot of people are confused with the packaging. You first open the lid then u have to push down the plastic part that compresses the brush. Then you will see a yellow piece in the middle of the brush, this is a stopper. It is meant to come out, it takes a bit of a pull to get out, but once you remove it the powder comes out very easily and is very easy to work with. It blended into my scalp very nicely and there was no patches of powder visible. I would give it a five star review but just because of how much product you get, for the price is not a lot but then again you don't have to use that much each use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Supergoop!'s (Re)setting 100% Mineral Powder SPF 35 Mineral Sunscreen is a game-changer for me. As someone who's always on the go and values convenience in skincare, this product has become an essential part of my daily routine. The powder formula makes it incredibly easy to apply and reapply sunscreen throughout the day without disrupting my makeup or leaving behind a greasy residue.  I appreciate that it offers SPF 35 protection, giving me peace of mind knowing my skin is shielded from the sun's harmful rays. Plus, being a mineral sunscreen, it's gentle on my sensitive skin and doesn't cause any irritation or breakouts.  One of the standout features for me is its versatility. Not only does it provide sun protection, but it also helps to set my makeup, giving me a matte finish that lasts for hours. It's like a two-in-one product that simplifies my beauty routine and saves me time.  However, I do have to mention that the packaging could be a bit more user-friendly. While the built-in brush is convenient for application on the go, it can be a bit messy and difficult to control the amount of product dispensed.  Overall, Supergoop!'s (Re)setting 100% Mineral Powder SPF 35 Mineral Sunscreen has earned a permanent place in my skincare arsenal. Its effectiveness, convenience, and skin-friendly formula make it a standout product that I highly recommend to anyone looking for hassle-free sun protection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love the product, love that it’s now refillable, hate some aspects of the new packaging. Not sure if this is just applicable to their Canadian version. The previous packaging enabled you to slide the brush portion back down easily so that you were able to place the cover back on, not any more. I spent about 5 min trying to not muck up the bristles. Not convenient, sadly returned

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Horrible packaging!!!! I love the idea of this product but the packaging broke very shortly after I bought it. A few of my friends had bought this prior to me and warned me to be careful so I was very cautious and it still broke.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Don’t waste your money! The packaging is awful! It doesn’t release any powder out! I ended up having to open the bottle and empty it in a small jar! There are better products out there! Worst spf powder I have ever purchased

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love love love my only wish would be make a darker version!!!! I use it for my hair line which sometimes leaves a white residue on my brown hair however can blend in definitely recommend!! ￼

reviews.review_title: Great product and concept. Just faulty packaging.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great concept. Always looking for spf to apply midday on top of makeup. This works just have to remove the spout when you first receive it (it’s taller than the brush because you have to remove that protective piece first. The packaging does break but other than that great product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this a while ago and honestly I thought I wasn’t able to use it properly as the powder wasn’t coming up but I just read the comments and it looks like I wasn’t the only person with the same issue. I would like to return it but I already threw the box away so I’m going to try dumping it into a container and using it from there and see how it goes not worth the money in my opinion. ￼

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Terrible product.. the packaging breaks. Unfortunately the power gets everywhere. The plastic was cracked and I wanted this for vacation but can’t take it anywhere.

reviews.review_title: Small Amount of Product in a Terrible Brush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The amount of product is sooooo small for the price you pay. Also, the packaging is terrible. I couldn't get the powder to come out of the brush at all. I ended up just opening it and dumping it into an old powder container I had.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Do not recommend. Bought it for my scalp as it always burns but now I have to return it. The spout where the powder comes out of the brush is taller than the brush itself, so the brush is useless. Not to mention the minimal amount of product you even receive for the price. Not worth the buy

reviews.review_title: Terrible if you have sensitive skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Burns and irritates my skin! I love the idea of the product but it causes extreme irritation and breakouts for me. I tired it several times, and every time I get a bad reaction.

reviews.review_title: Une poudre 2 en 1 pratique à avoir sur soi!
reviews.review_text: J’adore cette poudre solaire, j’ai tendance à transpirer facilement du visage surtout l’été ! Du coup parfait pour faire un tour aux toilettes et se poudrer tout en se protégeant le visage ! Je le recommandé après bien que pratique, le packaging n’était pas simple à utiliser au début.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great product for on the go sunscreen touch ups.  It is easy to apply and reduces shine. I keep one at home and one with me at all times!

reviews.review_title: Brush fell off after a few uses.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the product because I could put it on top as a powder and use for hair. After about 10 uses the  brush fell off so it was no longer usable.
I used this in my hair this summer. As someone who always burn in my hair part, this has prevented all burning. It's lightweight and didn't make my hair greasy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Use it a lot in my last travel!! Very easy to use during the day, no need a mirror, can easily be reapplied through out the day, help to manage the « shine » during a hot and sweaty day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Do not waste your time buying this. Package is not poorly engineered and impossible to get product out! Very disappointing. If I could give it 0 Stars I would.

reviews.review_title: New favourite - must have for travel
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is great for on the go. The container and application is amazing- just read the instructions and you’ll do it easily & properly. My 5 year old even figured it out. The yellow stick in the middle is part of the packaging and has to be popped out.   I had a hard time trusting that this powder would protect me from the harsh Caribbean sun because it’s so light and translucent but it actually did its job. I’ve even applied it on my kids when they needed a quick touch up on the go. 1 out of 3 of us that used it has extremely sensitive skin and it didn’t cause any irritation or problems. I only wish it was also available in a larger size so we could apply it to for larger areas like legs/ back etc easily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I will try to break down everything that makes the reviews about this product so polemic.  1) the product is really good. it's lightweight and gives a matte finish , which is what you want when you apply sunscreen over make up,  not the usual shiny look. 2) the applicator is not so bad. a lot of people complained about the yellow part in the middle of the brush,  saying it makes it impossible to apply the brush directly onto the face, but If you read the instructions on how to use that part must be removed before first use.  having said that, replacing the cap when the brush doesn't retract is a bit tricky. 3) the amount of product that comes in the package is completely ridiculous. for 46 dollars I would expect a LOT more.    overall,  very good product and I will be repurchasing, but I wish these things above were considered by the brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS!!!!!!!!!! such a great product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The product itself is good. I like the coverage it gives. Great for oily skin. However, the applicator is absolutely terrible. It’s really difficult to apply the product as the powder doesn’t always come out.  out:

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't really wear makeup anymore but this is great for evening skin tone and hiding most of the redness from my sensitive, blemished skin while still looking natural. My skin gets really red and this hides most of it where Im not feeling self conscious. It also stays on all day for me while not feeling cakey at all.  Applying this does require some patience to build up on your skin but I prefer that to avoid the caked feeling right off the bat if I used a separate powder.

reviews.review_title: Buy this if your scalp burns!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am fair skinned and my scalp always gets badly burnt and peels. I don’t suit hats and regular sunscreen makes my hair greasy so this has been a lifesaver! Haven’t even tried it on my face but can confirm this works great when applied to your scalp! Helps to absorb excess oil too which is good for my greasy hair!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this on for the first time aaaand it was horrible. I was completely dry, minimal grease and only brushed a little bit of product on my forehead first which looked HORRIBLE. It looked like when you have sun burn and the skin is peeling so no amount of concealer can make it look smooth aka it clings on to dry spots. The application is so dumb it doesn't distribute the powder evenly and even if you switch it to the close mode it keeps pouring out product. I'll stick to my Kbeauty sunscreen

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Literally nothing came out, tried multiple times and opened it correctly, don’t waste your money!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Didn’t love it. Found it to be too uneven and did not help prevent a burn.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product is mediocre considering how much everyone raves about Supergoop. It didn’t feel like anything special, and it was expensive. Little powder is dispensed at a time, and perhaps it gave me an SPF boost but  the powder never felt like it was coming out at the rate that I wanted it to. I was just dabbing my face forever to get a tiny bit of powder out. Wouldn’t buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very small amount of powder. A lot of empty space in bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a good sunscreen powder for refreshing your sunscreen during the day. size of packaging is perfect and you can carry it in your small bag but it’s overpriced for this  amount product. Generally I recommend it if you don’t care about price

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I burn very quickly and like to re-apply sunscreen often but when you have makeup on it isn't easy, now it is. I also like it for my hair part.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love powdered sunscreen.  This works great. I’ll buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used it 3-4 times and it broke… not impressed I am returning it.

reviews.review_title: Do not use as only sunscreen
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I use it every day on my face and love it. However, I also use a moisturizer plus tint with an spf 20.  I applied it to my arms today as I forgot sunscreen. I applied it twice in 3 hours and got very burnt.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had to look up how to remove the plastic in the centre so the product would dispense (it's there for protective reasons so the product doesn't spill before being sold to consumers). Like others, I had a moment where I thought it was a faulty product because of the plastic sticking out the middle, hahahah.  After that, the product came out well. I use it only for scalp protection on my hair part so it lasted a long time for me, but it's definitely too little product for the price if you're using it for your face.

reviews.review_title: Don’t Waste Your Money on Goop
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The applicator never worked properly even before it completely broke apart shortly after i bought it. The dispensing was very uneven and the powder itself it white and chalky. I have tried a two other goop suncreen products including the (face resetting spray with spf) and would not recommend ANY of them…. Would not use again even if they were free - buy something else!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to see this mineral setting powder with SPF especially because I have a hard time reapplying SPF in warm weather as I sweat quite a bit.   Unfortunately the “open/close” function on this did not work for me at all and I had to open the powder from the bottom and dump it onto my wrist, which is not easy to control the amount coming out and makes this product not very portable or efficient. Because there was so much product that came out the product come off cakey on my face. This might not happen if the applicator worked properly with a controlled amount of product being used.   Another poorly thought out design for the product is the tube part that the powder is supposed to come out of is in line with the product brush so you can’t really compress the brush on your face because the applicator is hard plastic. This makes application difficult even if the product were to come out properly.   Hopefully they can improve this product in the future because I really want to try this product for daily SPF

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Maybe product is ok but brush system doesn’t work. Kept trying, then it unscrewed and made a mess. Tried many times to get it to dispense, ended up having to pour onto my hand. Brush has a weird pot in the middle that makes application awkward so used my fingers. Will be returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The brush system did not work at all. I had to pour the powder out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Used this for over a week in Mexico and I love it! Will be great addition for anyone that works outdoors and wants to top up sunscreen without getting their hands messy!! Matte, and good overtop makeup. Package could use some work as I found it twists too far so you have to be gentle (read the instructions first before using). A little goes a long way if you use it right.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Here is the thing: this product needs a bigger container and refills. 46$ for this tiny amount is outrageous. BUT, that being said, it's incredible. Fits SO beautifully over the It Cosmetics Glow CC Cream. It blurs pores, keeps shine at bay and has really good sun protection. It is meant to be used as a touch up over makeup (because let's be realistic, who washes their face every 2 hours to reapply sunscreen and redo their makeup), not your sole sun protection. And again : it has to be used the right way. Make sure the bottle in unlocked (lock it before putting it in your purse). When it's unlocked, grap it with the brush downwards and just give it one shake down. The powder will fill the brush and you are ready to apply.  It works great for me. My only complaint is that there isn't enough product for it to be sustainable. You'd need a new product every 7-10 days if you apply it every day,  a couple of times a day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted this product to touch up my suncream in hot days, also remove shin on my forehead without mess up my make up however the applicator is very bad the powder doesnt come out and when you try harder lots of powder come out and make a big mess even if you try on your hand you will end up waisting produt. I trough out the box. I hope I can return it. This product should be like a compact format.

reviews.review_title: The best on the go sunscreen!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is amazing.  Years ago I tried other brands which were too heavy or too white.  This does not add colour, but it does mattify.  I bought it in Hawaii when I noticed my nose getting red and popped into the Sephora at Whaler's Village.  This is exactly what I was looking for.  I keep it in my purse to apply as needed.  Everyone needs this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product to put in your bag for touch ups, around your hairline and on ears where cream is too greasy.  Note you should still use your regular daily sunscreen before your makeup, this is for setting and touching up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Application is less messy than similar product from Colorscience

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: love this but it does not come with enough product and it's really annoying that you can't just buy a refill instead of the whole brush again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Please start selling refills for this so we don't have to purchase the brush and everything again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Everyone needs this not for setting powder…. For your hair line!! I hate wearing hates and I applied this to my hair line in the front of my head where I normally burn. Life changing. Pat the brush into your hair line! No burns! Decent for shine and setting as well. But I’d purchase again for my hair.

reviews.review_title: A little complex with the packaging, but I’m happy
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It took me a bit to figure out how the applicator works - but once I finally did, I am satisfied! I always wanted an easy way to reapply spf in the day.  I would recommend adding more clearly defined instructions in the box to avoid frustration!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the packaging and the idea. Great way to reapply without messing up your makeup. Every skin care girly should have this!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The brush disconnected when I was using  Powder everywhere lost most of the product  Disappointed dumped what I could save in a container  Like the other supergoop products

reviews.review_title: Great to take on the go!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the protection without having to use a cream!  Great for summer!  Helps set my makeup also so is 2 products in 1!  Portable and will buy again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Awesome idea and execution. To close the powder you need to twist the brush. I don't see here a problem.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this sunscreen. I have highly sensitive, breakout prone skin. I've been using it daily for a few months now without any reaction. The applicator is easy to use, it's truly transparent (no sign of it on with or without makeup), and is great for reapplying SPF throughout the day. I've been recommending it to everyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this. Will not disturb your makeup. love that it's a mineral sunscreen. Read the directions before using it because I could not figure it out. However, this is very little product for over $40, the price is a little crazy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Was skeptical about the translucent but it works really well and you can’t notice on top of the makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really love how light weight this powder is and how easy it is to add spf on top of makeup

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: the powder is great but the package is terrible. It comes with poor plastic container that looses a lot of this expensive product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! Protects my skin from the sun, helps absorb shine and applies perfect over my makeup.

reviews.review_title: helps protect skin on the go
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: starters: the yellow piece in the middle comes out. i had no idea and was initially frustrated. the lock is secure and the power is really nice. i have an issue with oily skin and sunscreen running into my eyes  over the day and then burning. this helps reduce that. i actually really like the product and its intended use.

reviews.review_title: Works well but unnecessarily complicated packaging
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I took this on a 3-week trip to Australia and New Zealand where I had a ton of beach and pool time. This achieved what I was looking for - a powder formula that applies easily without ruining my makeup. It provides good coverage and mattifies the skin. It's easy to apply with the built-in brush. However, as many have noted in this review section, the packaging is strangely convoluted. Every time I want to use it, I have to remove the lid (and hold that lid with one hand), push down the brush cylinder, then turn the powder lock to open in order to use. Then reverse those steps to close it! Often when I turn to close it, it somehow unscrews the whole powder chamber instead of lock into the closed position. Not an elegant product design. Luckily mine didn't break like others' did.   Hoping that Supergoop or some other brand could come up with more affordable powder SPF options with better application designs.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I actually really like this, I just wish there was more & it came out a bit easier. Otherwise, it’s done it’s job and it’s done it well!

once I opened it, I couldn't close it again , so it would apply way way too much powder. Then, the powder itself didn't sit well on makeup at all . Lifted makeup and looked cakey. I'll stick with re-applying tinted sunscreen
